content.eamr: ( ing-12 "1 (8 ounce) can crushed pineapple, drained" )

content.text: 0) Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
content.eamr:
( inst-0 / R
	:inform ( ac-0-0 "Preheat"@3:10 / AC
		:ppt ( tool-0-0 "oven"@11:15 / TOOL )
		:heat ( temp-0-0 "350 degrees F"@19:32 / TEMPERATURE )
		:heat ( temp-0-1 "175 degrees C"@34:47 / TEMPERATURE )
	)
)

content.text: 1) Grease and flour a 9x13 inch pan.
2) Mix flour, baking soda, baking powder, salt and cinnamon.
content.eamr:
( inst-2 / R
	:inform ( ac-2-0 "Mix"@3:6 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-0 "flour"@7:12 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-1 "baking soda"@14:25 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-2 "baking powder"@27:40 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-3 "salt"@42:46 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-4 "cinnamon"@51:59 / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 3) Make a well in the center and add sugar, oil, eggs and vanilla.
content.eamr:
( inst-3 / R
	:inform ( ac-3-0 "Make"@3:7 / AC
		:ppt ( "a well"@8:14 / OTHER )
		:source ( "the center"@18:28 / OTHER )
	)
	:inform ( ac-3-1 "add"@33:36 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-5 "sugar"@37:42 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-6 "oil"@44:47 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-7 "eggs"@49:53 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-8 "vanilla"@58:65 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 4) Mix with wooden spoon until smooth.
content.eamr:
( inst-4 / R
	:inform ( ac-4-0 "Mix"@3:6 / AC
		:instrument ( tool-4-0 "wooden spoon"@12:24 / TOOL )
		:until ( cond-4-0 "until smooth"@25:37 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 5) Stir in carrots, coconut, walnuts and pineapple.
content.eamr:
( inst-5 / R
	:inform ( ac-5-0 "Stir in"@3:10 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-9 "carrots"@11:18 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-10 "coconut"@20:27 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-11 "walnuts"@29:36 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-12 "pineapple"@41:50 / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 7) Bake at 350 degrees for about 45 minutes.
content.eamr:
( inst-7 / R
	:inform ( ac-7-0 "Bake"@3:7 / AC
		:heat ( temp-7-0 "350 degrees"@11:22 / TEMPERATURE )
		:duration ( dur-7-0 "about 45 minutes"@27:43 / DUR )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 8) Don't panic, the center will sink a little.
10) To make the frosting: Cream the butter and cream cheese until smooth.
content.eamr:
( inst-10 / R
	:inform ( ac-10-0 "Cream"@26:31 / AC
		:subtask ( purp-10-0 "To make the frosting"@4:24 / PURPOSE_CLAUSE )
		:ppt ( ing-14 "the butter"@32:42 / FOOD )
	)
	:inform ( ac-10-1 "cream"@47:52 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-13 "cheese"@53:59 / FOOD )
		:until ( cond-10-0 "until smooth"@60:72 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 11) Add the confectioners sugar and beat until creamy.
